data.name: Rogue Company - Second Sight Starter Pack
data.detailed_description:
Charm your enemies with the Second Sight Starter Pack! Look enchanting with Glimpse's Mystic Prodigy Outfit and have your weapon stand out with the Celestite Weapon Wrap. You'll also receive 300 Rogue Bucks to use in the store to complete your alluring look.

This Pack Contains:
- Mystic Prodigy Glimpse Outfit
- Celestite Primary Weapon Wrap
- 300 Rogue Bucks
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Charm your enemies with the Second Sight Starter Pack! Look enchanting with Glimpse's Mystic Prodigy Outfit and have your weapon stand out with the Celestite Weapon Wrap. You'll also receive 300 Rogue Bucks to use in the store to complete your alluring look.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core i5-2320
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 555
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3.20 ghz 12
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
